name: Echolocation (Dwight Davis)
description:
Only one of the five senses

This game was created for the GMTK Game Jam. Using the jam's prompt "only one," you must navigate levels and puzzles using only one of your senses - your sense of hearing. Use sound effects to triangulate your location, mark your progress on a map, and try to reach the end goal before the timer runs out! But watch out, things aren't always as simple as they look (or sound).
